Welder: 1-year course. Learn welding techniques, safety, and tools.
Electrician: 2-year course. Learn house wiring, motors, and maintenance.
COPA: 1-year course. Learn computer operation and programming assistance.
Fitter: 2-year course. Learn machine fitting and assembly.
Cosmetology: 1-year course. Learn hair, skin, and beauty treatments.
FashionDesigning: 1-year course. Learn garment designing and stitching.
Architectural Draftsman: 2-year course. Learn construction drawing and design.
IT: 2-year course. Learn IT tools, web and application development.
